titleStmt.title: SII 4.511: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 511. (A.R. No. 64 of 1892). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti . samasta jagadekavīra khaṭgaikavīra vīrarākṣasavikhyātimaduttara laṅkārāma manukulasamuddharaṇa pracaṇḍaraṇamukhasammukharājapracaṇḍamāruta coḷakulaparibhavanirākaraṇavikrama trivarṣadhāritamakuṭadvaya rājarāja sarveśvara sandhānadhūrtta pāṇḍyakeraḷavijyamānacāmarayugaḷa pāṇḍyamaṇḍalapuṇḍarīka kannāṭarājapratikūlakāladaṇḍa makarālayamajjitaripubala virasomiśvarakarāmuktapādavirābharaṇa
rājaparameśvara rājaparammāheśvara rājanārāyaṇa sakalasamayasthāpaka vyāḷakuñjaramalla senāsamūharakṣaka senāpālanapunarabhiyāta rājagānavidyāvallabha pratirājahṛdayaśalya tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīrāceṉtiracoḻatevarkku yāṇṭu 7 vatu makaranāyaṟṟu Aparapakṣattu Aṣṭamiyum putaṉkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa cittiraināḷ periyakoyiṟ śrīvaiṣṇavarkaḷolai kulottuṅka
coḻapaṭṭiṉattu viyāpārikaḷil Olaimaṅkalamuṭaiyāṉ poṉṉampalakūttaṉ tiruveṇkāṭuṭaiyārum Olaimaṅkalamuṭaiyāṉ Aruḷāḷaṉ Aḻakiyamaṇavāḷapperumāḷuṅ kaṇṭu tirukkuṟaippaṟṟu teṉoḻuṅkil tirunāmattukkāṇi maṉṟaccanampi tiruttukku teṟkkil Ākavāṟṟuppaṭukaiyil Āṟuṭaintu maṇaliṭṭuppayirceyyappeṟātu kiṭakkiṟa Iṭam Avalamutupu
ṟamākat tiruttuvittut taraveṇumeṉṟu tāṅkaḷ collukaiyāle Ippaṭi ceyvatākap peṟaveṇumeṉṟu perumāḷ Uttarayaṉattukku puṟappaṭṭuaruḷi vikkiramacoḻaṉperiya tirumaṇṭapattu pukaḻāparaṇaṉ tirumuttuppantalkkiḻ cerapāṇṭiyartampirāṉ tiruppaḷḷikkaṭṭilil Eḻuntaruḷi Irukka svāmikaḷ paṅkayaccelvi moṭṭaya nāṅkaḷum tiruppaṇiceyyum nampimārum viṇ
ṇappañceyyat tiruuḷḷumāy Ippaṭi ceyvatākac colli Uṅkaḷ Olai kuṭuṅkoḷ Eṉṟu tiruvāymoḻintaruḷukaiyil maṉṟaccanampi tiruttil karaikku teṟkkil paṭukaiyil Irāmāṉucaṉ cuṟṟukkulaiccevvaikku meṟkku naṭuvil viṭṭukkaṭṭikku kiḻakku maṇaliṭāyp payircceyyaoṇṇātu kiṭakkiṟa Uttecappaṭi nilam Iruveliyum ta Attamiṭṭu tiruttik karaiyuṅ kaṭṭuvittu neṟppa
yirum Ālaikkarumpum Uḷḷuṭṭa payirc ceyvittu taṅkaḷukkum taṅkaḷ santāṉattukkum naṉṟāka Avalamutu ceyvatākavum Ippaṭi cantirātittavarai cellappaṇṇuka :—paṇiyāl koyiṟkaṇakku śrīvaiṣṇavappiriyaṉ Eḻuttu . paṅkajāki sya . Ippaṭikku tiruvaraṅkapperumāḷdāsaṉ Eḻuttu . Ivai cirānampi Eḻuttu Ivai śrīcaṭakopavaḷḷal Eḻuttu .
śrī vaikuntadāsaṉ Eḻuttu . Irājamahentiranampi Eḻuttu . Aḻakiyamaṇavāḷanampi Eḻuttu . cirāmadāsaṉ Eḻuttu . vaṇṭuvarāpatinampi Eḻuttu tiruttāḻvaraidāsaṉeḻuttu . śrīcaṭakopappiriyaṉeḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 4.511 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
